Obama: s announcement of the departure of all U.S. troops from Iraq: The expert's verdict mentions Obama's announcement in October 2011 that all U.S. troops would depart Iraq before Christmas. This announcement further confirms that the mission in Iraq ended under Obama's presidency.
The 2008 Status of Forces Agreement: The expert's verdict mentions that most of the timetable for leaving Iraq was in place before Obama took office, referring to the 2008 Status of Forces Agreement. While this aspect does not directly verify the claim, it provides context and information about the timeline of the mission in Iraq.
